title: Cushion cover
medium:
Medium: mercerized cotton embroidery on cotton
Technique: embroidered on plain weave foundation
description: Embroidered cotton square intended as a cushion cover, with a vertically and horizontally mirrored pattern of a rose-colored flower with grass-green leaves, surrounded by pale blue acanthus leaves, after a design by William Morris. It was purchased as a kit in the Morris shop in London, and worked by the donor.
name: Cushion cover
